Mary Carl

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Marie; Culuppa
  2. Foster Name: Mary Carl
  3. Foster Family: Mary Heser
  4. Foster Family Alt: Mamie; Mayme
  5. Location of Family: Hebron, NE
  6. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  7. Arrival Place: Hebron, NE
  8. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  9. Date of Birth: 1908-07-20
  10. Date of Death: 1986-10-06
  11. Gender: female
  12. Married Name: Mary (Marie) Kingdon
  13. Spouse Name: Howard V. Kingdon
  14. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; OTR #11; Grand Island Daily Independent, 6 October 1986; 1940 United States Federal Census; Interview of Marie Kingdon.
